website_summaries.verdict: This powder's applicator could be improved and it takes some skill to apply, but the high SPF makes is worth considering for those who need makeup that's practical for outdoor wear.
pros: Stands out for its superior 50 SPF and water-resistant mineral loose powder formula
Can be worn alone or on top of other makeup products
cons: The product/applicator in one design can be frustrating, as clogs and malfunctions occur frequently
Powder takes a little extra effort to blend

customer_reviews.title: Applicator Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this a one star, because the brush application is so frustrating. My skin doctor has applied this on me and recommended it for a recent trip I was taking to a sunny location. I read the instructions and watched a video on how to get the brush working, but still had a hard time getting the applicator to work. One should not have to try so hard to apply sun protectant. I love the portability, but argh!!! This is not an inexpensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the SPF 50- the box says SPF 50 ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the SPF 50- the box says SPF 50 but the actual product container inside is SPF 30. :(. Someone needs to go through the packages and open them up. There is definitely a mix-up!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the expense...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sold on powder mineral sunscreen. While I like the idea of it (something matte, not full of chemicals, no greasy lotion) it certainly didn't protect my face while out at my daughter's soccer game. Never came home sun-burnt using my old liquid sunscreen but it was obvious I'd had too much sun after I'd switched to this and her game was only an hour. For the amount I paid, I expected it to work at least as well as my liquid sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: riirca37

customer_reviews.title: My dermatologist recommended this product
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this product, because I complained that lotions just sweated off and got into my eyes. At first I wasn't going to buy because I don't wear makup ever and the price. I figured one little tube would be less then the procedure for freezing off skin cancers. I used it on a two week vacation where we did lots of hiking and sweating. Boy did it work well. You really counldn't tell I had it on and it didn't run into my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: bjhasd

customer_reviews.title: A-M-A-Z-I-N-G
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to sunscreen for my nose and extra protection. Improves my complexion instantly without looking like makeup. I tried a "clear" version (different brand) and I couldn't tell if I was applying anything. The color is extremely helpful in this case. Make sure the back is screwed on!! Mine came off and I lost all my powder in the sink. Had to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am in mid 60's and use this product a great deal. It's very convenient to put on after base. I brush it on my hands before driving. It's expensive but worth it. It lasts a long time!!!
customer_reviews.author: ergie

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for over 8 years and I can't recommend it enough
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for over 8 years and I can't recommend it enough!! Too bad I don't make commission on it, because I sell some wherever I go!! Amusement parks, theme parks, beaches, ball games...this stuff is the best when you have small children! Especially ones with fair skin who refuse to wear hats!!!! Love it, love it, LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Cadoret

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this is a fake. My order came cracked and powder was everywhere. Knowing i could still use what’s inside i tried it out and it seems so different from the stuff i bought at dermatologist. It’s hard to even get the powder to come out! DONE buying any beauty products off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Evan M.

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of this but I only gave it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this but I only gave it four stars because I didn’t give the coverage I was looking for. I think it’s on there but I can’t really tell a huge difference. It’s not like your regular powder foundation. However you have to take off the little tiny rubber band off of the brush before the powder will start to release. I’ve seen many reviews where people indicated no powder being released.
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Dawnella

customer_reviews.title: Protect your skin!
customer_reviews.text: I am an aestheticism, and this is one my most favorite sun protection products! You can take this anywhere and reapply so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the idea of a sunscreen that would also be a powder, but this was just not good. First you never know if you have the appropriate amount on, and so you put it on till you can tell you are wearing powder...which looks bad. The color is yellowish when applied, so you look a little jaundiced. Also, you definitely feel like you are wearing something and it makes me break out slightly when applied directly to skin. I would stick to your less expensive sunblocks.
customer_reviews.author: Smashmouth33

customer_reviews.title: Great- invisible/lightweight/nongreasy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb! Was skeptical - used at Universal in 95+ heat- full sun- not a spot of burn and I burn easily! Also great to use on hair parts! As if I have nothing on!
customer_reviews.author: robbin

customer_reviews.title: I ordered and paid significantly more for the SPF 50 ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid significantly more for the SPF 50. The box said 50, but the product inside was SPF 30.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Expired Product! Total Scam! Order directly from Colorescience!
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and order colorescience products from the official website! I just purchased this, it’s February... this stuff expires in March!! I didn’t spend this much money to only have a product that’s good for a month when it’s supposed to last several. Needless to say, I’ll be returning this. Colorescience is a great brand and o should have listened to my gut and just ordered from their site!
customer_reviews.author: Eperki2

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered my third colorescience mineral sunscreen. This goes on light and easy, provides excellent sun protection and cuts down on shine. I originally got it for my beach bag, but I've taken to wearing it daily in place of foundation and powder. It has just enough tint to smooth imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: S. Colby

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this product before leaving for vacation and forgot ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product before leaving for vacation and forgot to pack it. Since I have been home I was excited to try this, but sorry to say it is an epic fail. The brush is stiff and scratchy....powder seems to come out all at once or not at all! ....very expensive and not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DDove

customer_reviews.title: Recommend This
customer_reviews.text: I wear moisturizer with sunscreen, usually creamy blush, but I don’t use foundation so this spf powder is my little added layer of protection. Color is not heavy, subtle and natural. My go to choice- on my 3rd tube and have used product for over 2 years.I have used other brands (spf powder in this kind of convenient applicator is hard to find) but their brushes fall apart or the powder is not so neutral or translucent like I prefer for an age 70 natural look. I am about to order another tube-can’t be without spf in southern CA.
customer_reviews.author: CA Lady

customer_reviews.title: It was recommended by my Derm
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for over 10 years. It was recommended by my Derm, and it works great! Never leave home without it.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Girl 94526

customer_reviews.title: Could not dispense
customer_reviews.text: Mine did not dispense the powder. I have tried and tried. Some of my friend tried too, but could not dispense the powder. I think the company should send me another one that dispenses the powder.
customer_reviews.author: jmeer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work, bought it for my daughter for her face as she breaks out from cream sunscreens. Her friend recommended this as she uses it and it works well. My daughter borrowed her friends and had great results, after being in the sun most of the day no burning on her sensitive facial skin. The one I bought from this website did not work, my daughter's face burnt and this is a none effective product. A big waste of $65!! I wish I could return it but I bought it back in July and she just took a Carribean trip and realized we got scammed with a defective product. Do not trust!!!!! Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hatala

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I found the concept of powder sunscreen really intriguing because I have really oily skin. Once I started applying this product, however, I wasn’t sure if I was covering my whole face. I’d rather not take the risk of not being protected from the sun so I went back to my lotion sunscreen and just use the Colorescience SPF to touch up throughout the day. That’s basically what this product is for, but for the money I spent, I expected way more. There are other similar products on the market that cost way less and do the exact same thing. I suggest you do your research before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Alba

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for me!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried lots of SPF powders and this one is the best I’ve tried. It’s lightweight (doesn’t go on super heavy; doesn’t over dry your skin, doesn’t look fake). I don’t need to carry a brush with me to apply. And it doesn’t go all over the place like others do. I use mine in my convertible and like to quickly apply at a stop light without having powder go everywhere. Perfect product for me — easy and fuss/mess free! But my favorite thing about this stuff is that I can reapply sunscreen throughout the day without destroying my makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this sunscreen for years. It does not run or bleed and stays on through long runs and even tennis tournaments. Never go outside without it and recommend it to everyone. Has never broken me out and I have cystic acne and am allergic to all kinds of makeup and skin care products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: misrepresented product
customer_reviews.text: In the product description it states that product is 1.7oz, but what I received is only .21oz. That is a big difference. I'm returning this; I can get the bigger size for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Powder does not come out I bought this for vacation and it did not work and now I can not return - very upset it was expensive and it can not be used at all
customer_reviews.author: TREF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its perfect if you wear makeup and need a touch up on the go.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Never was able to get it to work
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this as it was recommended by a friend - said it was good for reapplying sunscreen during tennis. But the one I received had product all caked at the base of the brush when it arrived, blocking the powder from getting out. After repeated contacts with the company (where they suggested I tap it -really hard - on hard surfaces to open it up), I finally gave up. Waste of money, they need to rethink the delivery mechanism for the powder.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. A complete waste of money. I followed the instructions and still no powder. Contacted Coloerscience ad they said to bank it hard on a solid surface. I did that and managed to get some powder but you have to repeat this process every bloody time you use and even then it is difficult to know if you are actually powdering your face or just brushing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy application, so use more frequently than liquid sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Nice alternative to the goopy liquid stuff! Applies easily (recommend do outside since the powder gets airborne). Goes on easily and can even put in part of hair. Carries easily in a purse. Only caution is if you'll be sweating a lot while outside, you'll likely need the real stuff as this will wipe off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Look passed the price! This product is so handy and easy to use plus is really works well. I teach so this stays on my desk til time to head outside for playtime. A quick swipe while everyone lines up and I'm good to go. Love that it lasts, the powder is so lightweight - doesn't feel greasy or make you sweat more like many other sunscreens. My doctor loves the protection it offers.
customer_reviews.author: MCMVI

customer_reviews.title: ... is truly a 50 spf I will be very happy. I wanted to say that the bottom screws ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this product a few times but if it is truly a 50 spf I will be very happy. I wanted to say that the bottom screws off so you can put it in another container and use it that way rather than having it flow through the brush. I like applying it this way because I can see how much is on the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Positive Thinker

customer_reviews.title: Never worked!,
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for vacation. When I went to use it , it never worked. Could nit get the powder to come out at all for this price I expect the item to work properly. Because I bought it in advance of my trip by the time I tried to use it and found that it didn’t work it was too late to return. Very disappointed. Will nit purchase again
customer_reviews.author: FlyladyAA

customer_reviews.title: Poor value for your hard earned dollars
customer_reviews.text: It’s light weight because there is very little product in the reservoir. I had read that some folks had trouble getting the powder to come out... my experience was quite the opposite. I followed the instructions and most of the powder evacuated it’s chamber! It is very difficult to do a color match with this product as well. I can’t speak to the sun protection because I am still dusting the powder off of my counter. If you want to throw $65 down the toilet buy this powder. I cannot rate it low enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mama D

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price - badly designed!
customer_reviews.text: Can not dispense the product without a great deal of banging and frustration. Not worth the money. The small amount I got out onto my hand was very chalky. Still, can’t judge well enough because the stuff won’t come out in any measurable amount! I returned - it would end up in some drawer unused.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Day

customer_reviews.title: Product won't come out.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love Colorscience products but this has been a challenge to even use. I have spent the past two days trying to use the powder and it just does not seem to want to come out. I have read and re-read directions and tried over and over to tap and shake nothing. The brush doesn't even get any color from the powder. I even went on youtube and googled for help, nothing helped. I will definitely update this IF I can ever actually use the product.
customer_reviews.author: misty mccrary

customer_reviews.title: Cannot activate after weeks of trying!
customer_reviews.text: The brush application is so frustrating. I read the instructions and watched a video on how to get the brush working, but still no product comes out! I have try daily for weeks! It is too expensive to be wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Cortes-Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this works but I’m using it
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of a SPF that can be reapplied over makeup and fits in my purse. But I’m not sure if it’s actually working. First off, it’s hard to get the product out even after tapping firmly, and once I apply, I don’t know how much to apply because I don’t see the powder or feel it. I ended up giving up on it and just wearing sunblock SPF50 under my makeup. It was too much trouble for a product that doesn’t seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: I had been on a wine country trip and a friend brought this sunscreen. She swore by it and said she uses it on her kids all the time. We all ended up trying it and loved it so I had to buy my own. It works really well. The powder is so sheer I wasn't sure if I was actually applying it or not. It offers great sun protection, keeps my face from looking really shiny and is water resistant! As a San Diegan, I also appreciate that it was made locally.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Seay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is such an easy product to brush on during the day for sunscreen touch ups without smearing lotion all over, especially on the (rare) days that I wear makeup. I can also swoop in and brush it on the kids during the day too without getting them all greasy. It’s definitely not cheap but it is a great product and I carry it with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Clean and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We went on a girl's cruise and we all used this product to keep our faces from burning. Super easy to use and it WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: CrAzyMaMaT

customer_reviews.title: but with the recommendation of a friend who swore by it I thought I would give it a try and very glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I have never spent this much money on sunscreen, but with the recommendation of a friend who swore by it I thought I would give it a try and very glad I did. An excellent product, even though it is expensive. No wait time for a lotion to absorb, no greasyness, no break outs. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: jjjjordan

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so darned much. I even use it on my body to layer over liquid sunscreen. I've had no problem with the dispenser. Works well. When I use this I don't get burned, unless overly sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. 髙﨑

customer_reviews.title: does not work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product does not dispense out of the brush applicator. 65$ waste of my money that I can't return because it has been opened. Do not buy this product. I did bust it open and use the powder with another brush but still got sunburn. so NO to this.
customer_reviews.author: willow

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mineral SPF! I put it on over my tinted moisturizer in the morning. I have sensitive skin and haven't broken out at all from it!
customer_reviews.author: N. Tarte

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and carry with you
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about the claims made by this product but decided to try it since I needed something easy to use while traveling. It’s lived up to all the claims. I must use sunscreen every day so I apply it in the morning. However, it was hard for me to reapply since I couldn’t carry it with me. The Sunscreen Brush is the ideal solution. I carry it in my purse and reapply every few hours. It’s light on the skin but very effective.
customer_reviews.author: IKW

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Came Off (again)
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product for a long time but will not be buying it again. This is the 2nd one I've own that had the bottom come apart and I lost all the remaining product. Very disappointing considering how expensive it is. I suggest you always check the bottom to ensure it's screwed on tightly or put tape around it.
customer_reviews.author: msjulieyaj

customer_reviews.title: Powder doesn't come out
customer_reviews.text: Does not come out . I hit it i banged it i poked it and nothing. I've tried to use it but it doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: ps23

customer_reviews.title: Brush is the problem
customer_reviews.text: The dry powder sunscreen product itself probably works pretty well. However the idea of using a brush dispenser just plain doesn't work. I've bought two of these and neither worked. The last one, which costs a whopping $65 by the way, stopped dispensing the sunscreen powder after about a week. Until the manufacturer gets this problem fixed--if it even can be fixed--this is not a product I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 1MorHacker

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen as a topper or touch ups.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this sunscreen, but I don’t use it exclusively so I can’t really attest to its efficacy as a stand-alone product. I have sensitive skin and rely on zinc sunscreen to protect it, but as anyone who uses mineral sunscreen will tell you it can leave a white cast on your skin. I use this brush on product to help eliminate the white cast on my skin while providing an additional layer protection and also reducing shine. It takes a little time for the product to start coming out like it’s supposed to, but once it does it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Joe

customer_reviews.title: the worst product I have ever ordered on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Of all the years, I have ordered items on Amazon, this is the worst product I have received. .It's impossible to get the "powder" to come out of the brush. I would return it immediately for a refund, but I was one day late to get my money back. It's heading to the garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: j brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. I’ve used a powdered SPF before I’ve never had such an issue getting the powder onto the brush. It then broke immediately after the second use.
customer_reviews.author: RøuR

customer_reviews.title: How dark is “medium”?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered medium.the color is much too light. My friend recommended this product. Her medium is much darker then mine. Why is that.? I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: harriet blackstein

customer_reviews.title: sunscreen without the oiliness
customer_reviews.text: Most cream sunscreens and foundation with sunscreen are too oily for me, makeup doesn't go on well over it. I love that this is not greasy and is so easy to apply and carry with you. It's light, doesn't leave a really powdery finish, and keeps makeup from melting off. Lasts a long time, too! This is my second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Moughler

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It’s a bit pricey but worth it, there are other alternatives so I don’t know if I will buy again but I do love it great to put on top of make up to reapply sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: The product concept seems good but if the way to apply if with the bristles and the bristles are sharp, then... OUCH. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Francie Nolan

customer_reviews.title: It won't come out of the container!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to prime the brush and some product came out the first time I tried it. The second time - nothing. For $65 I can find a better product. Very disappointed. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! Applicator/ dispenser BREAKS and spills everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Product itself worked well for sun protection. However the dispenser/ applicator is not secure and came open in my purse and lost all the powder (expensive!) and ruined everything in my purse that couldn’t be soap and water washed and ruined the expensive leather purse that cannot be washed. Buyer beware I would never take this product applicator anywhere in anything you like. Destruction and loss of both the expensive product and my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: I love the product but hate the applicator
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but hate the applicator. Great sun protection. Feels light. Long-lasting. Works better than any powder I've ever used for keeping the shine away. BUT THE APPLICATOR SUCKS! I'll keep buying it despite the cost and applicator because it works so well, but it sure would be nice to have a traditional powderpuff in a pot type packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K. Nargan

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Product does NOT come out..have tried everything, short of me cutting the bottle open. Also the brush is awful -- The whole thing was a crushing disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin H

customer_reviews.title: Good for super sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I get this from my derm and also on Amazon. I have very fair skin and the medium works well over my Complexion Rescue in Birch 1.5. Use it as a final once over to add another layer of sun protection for the day and also to give me a little more color to my fair skin. Have been using this for several years and no problem for my Rosacea/Eczema skin.
customer_reviews.author: N. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Applicator Won't Release Powder!
customer_reviews.text: I can't review the quality of the product because I can't get the powder to release! I've spent entirely too much time swirling the brush, gently tapping it, shaking it, etc. The powder will NOT release, so I've essentially spent $65 for nothing. Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mansour

customer_reviews.title: This sunscreen is really good for re application Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sunscreen brush because it uses the ingredients zinc that is the most impressive and titanium dioxide that does not harm the skin. It is easy to use and re-apply throughout the day. the bad thing is that the brush is a bit hard. your brush are not so soft to the face
customer_reviews.author: leidy yulieth correa pabon

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I feel that it really does work and keeps my skin from getting sunburned. I would apply it twice a day and I use it on top of my sunscreen for double protection. It's a little difficult to apply you have to press on your skin to get the product out but its okay. I do wish the application process was a little easier but I still love it and I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alejandra

customer_reviews.title: i love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: i love this stuff, no more tears from my kids. it's not waterproof so i do have to reapply when we are at the beach, pool, lake etc, but they don't mind. it is the only sunscreen we have used on our faces all summer and no sunburns, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection, horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love the powder - great sun protection, does perfect coverage without looking like heavy makeup. I’m buying it for the 3rd summer in a row. But I absolutely hate the packaging. Its impossible to get the powder go through the brush by simply shaking the tube. I usually open the tube, put the powder on top of a paper napkin and then dip the brush and apply to my face. Unfortunately this way a lot of powder goes to waste :( . I wish they packaged the powder into a regular loose powder jar with a brush separately.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Nice powder
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen works but the powder itself has little coverage. The fair shade is more like a white or translucent powder. I thought about this after purchasing, but you can't properly clean the brush without the risk of ruining the powder. Overall it's a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Good sunscreen, but bad applicator
customer_reviews.text: Sunscreen itself is good: SPF works and lightweight. Applicator is horrible though: I can never get the powder out without a fight. I watched their video numerous times, but my tube simply never worked like the video showed?!
customer_reviews.author: Cen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, the SPF seems effective, easy to wash off. A little spendy for me, so I only buy it occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: B&J Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: After using this prior and trying others I have come back to this. The coverage is great over makeup or without. Easy to apply. Others I tried did not shake out well. Kinda pricey but definitely worth it. I will only purchase this brand
customer_reviews.author: David J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Not translucent, horrible packaging!
customer_reviews.text: The brush is horrible, the powder does not come out enough to actually spread on my face. IT IS NOT translucent. Too dark-kind of yellowish for my fair complexion. It has a glow to it, makes it look like I have foundation. Didn’t like it. Not buying again
customer_reviews.author: María Susana Huntwork

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT even come out of the container.......grrrrrrrrrrrr
customer_reviews.text: I want a refund. Does NOT even work to be able to put on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I know it’s pricey but I think it’s worth it! I carry this around in my bag and it’s so handy when I least expect it... talking in a parking lot and realizing the back of my neck is burning.. touching up my nose when it’s been hours since applying sun protectant moisturizer.. You can discreetly use it without worrying about not rubbing in bright white sunscreen on your face, or getting your hands greasy if you’re eating, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for all members of the family: no mess
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this for everyone. Great invisible light weight coverage. No mess, no sticky lotions or sprays. You won't even know it's there. Its the only sun block the men in my family will commit to wearing every day. Does not sting in your eyes when you sweat. Will not expire (like liquids). Water proof.
customer_reviews.author: The Gentry's

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Effective.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy. Expensive, but I don't use it everyday. It's great to keep in the car or in your purse. I took it on a trip and it worked fantastically well. It was much nicer than a cream or spray and it is in a travel ready package.
customer_reviews.author: SF Jan

customer_reviews.title: Dispenser is broken
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have bought it numerous times. However, when I bough this online and received it, I could not get the product to come out. I got a replacement (very easy process) but the replacement didn't work either. Thinking it was me, I kept it in shame and finally got the guts to take it to a local med spa where I usually purchase the product. The girls couldn't get it to work either. It's a great product, my advice is just to verify that it works before it's too late to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared to swirl, tap and try again after reading the reviews unfortunately this did NOT work. I am terribly disappointed in the product. If I felt like throwing $65 I would order again but I don't so I will use this as a lesson. Too much hassle and the product has not worked at all.
customer_reviews.author: B.J.

customer_reviews.title: Defective order
customer_reviews.text: Maybe just my luck but the applicator was broken and wouldn’t release any powder. Followed all directions, watched tutorials online. Returned defective product.
customer_reviews.author: KMW7598

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get the product out. Have to turn it upside down and pound it with the lid on before using. Not sure how to clean the brush for sanitation. I Like the finish over my makeup. Gives a glow to the skin, looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light feeling
customer_reviews.text: This powder is so easy to use as well as it feels light on the skin. It doesn’t cake in the wrinkles at all. It doesn’t feel like you have anything on but gives great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get powder to come out
customer_reviews.text: The powder doesn’t come out. I have watched the video and tried everything. I can get hardly any to come out. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Avree E.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work. Didn’t know how to use it. Threw it right away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, also works on kids faces
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to put on my hair part so I wouldn't burn my scalp or end up with greasy hair. It worked well for that! I also liked it on my face, ears, neck, and decolletage, and it provided some light color. I later discovered that my kids preferred to be "painted" with the powder sunscreen on their faces and ears rather than a stick or lotion sunscreen. I usually used a cheaper powder on them, but this worked well too.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come out
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I worded or not bc I couldn’t get the product to come out. With other brands I could see the powder on the brush. This just didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: LizMStryker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use carry in hand bag , gentle on skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not replace face powder. Super sheer.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sun protection, but it does not replace face powder. I can’t see it on my fave at all. I like the 50 SPF. Saves my skin from further damage.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The powder doesn't dispense that well and the brush is really rough and itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeyoon Rhee

customer_reviews.title: Product I received was not the one in the photo
customer_reviews.text: The night before I headed out for a trip, I opened the container to put the sunscreen in my bag. What I opened was liquid sunscreen. When I say liquid, I mean runny. I didn't get too burnt, so I guess the product did its job, but for that kind of money, it should have been what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Lol

customer_reviews.title: Never forget your sunblock
customer_reviews.text: Got this from my dermatologist originally and I haven’t looked back since. This is the easiest way to put sunblock on my face and now I never forget!
customer_reviews.author: S. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: cool product, but broke very easily
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for a product, but the casing broke the second time I used it. It seems like it should be too nice of a product to break that easily.
customer_reviews.author: Reesie

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use 2 of these. Both times, the powder did not flow through the brush. The instructions warn of this problem (and advise to return if it does not work). Obviously, quality control is NOT an attribute of this company. A good idea, but a bad dispensing method.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult application
customer_reviews.text: I cant tell if the powder is even coming out. I have to brush it on a white paper towel repeatedly to see when the powder is actually on the brush. Nice thought.. wish it worked..
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: SPF 50 Sunscreen Brush
customer_reviews.text: This product is OK would not order again. Too expensive and the powder is difficult to apply to face. It also clumps. I need a product more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Works for melasma
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Works well for melasma. Easy to carry with and apply throughout the day. Can be used without makeup or over top. Dermatologist recommended re-apply every hour if will be in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: My wife has reactions UV light and this product lets her be protected and not look like she is wearing a mask
customer_reviews.text: If you want product you can trust..this is it. It is effective and efficient. Don't be put off by the price as it lasts a long time when correctly used. My wife has reactions UV light and this product lets her be protected and not look like she is wearing a mask.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because a friend uses the same product on the tennis court to reapply her sunscreen. It's quick and easy and doesn't leave a slippery residue on the hands, so it's perfect for court side reapplications of sunscreen. Also, you don't have to worry about getting it completely rubbed in. It's super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: thesciencemom

customer_reviews.title: Order it NOW!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how a powder that goes on so easy, looks good & actually works really well! Kids will love using a sunscreen doesn't burn their eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Expires too soon
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and arived yesterday on April 15 2020 it expires on 11-2020. The expiration date is usually 1-2 years out. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I simply didn't like it. I read so much reviews about it, but not for me. It is not cheap, yet I have to fight with it every time, so I get some powder out of it. No instructions what so ever on how to start using it, and with difficulty I managed to find a video in YouTube. Every time I havw to tap it so hard on a hard surface to get only few powder. Not worth the trouble or the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eman Al-Houli

customer_reviews.title: Won’t dispense
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get product to dispense, and contacting the manufacturer got me a cut and paste response that wasn’t helpful. Reading online it seems it’s not that unusual, so I cannot recommend this spf powder.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Could not get it to dispense
customer_reviews.text: Tried forever, on my hand and face, and this stuff never came out of the container thru the brush. Threw it out and felt crabby I paid so darn much money for it. Caveat Emptor.
customer_reviews.author: Hightech Buckarette

product_meta.title: Colorescience Sunforgettable Total Protection SPF 50 Mineral Sunscreen Brush, Oil-Free
product_meta.description: Color:FairColorescience Sunforgettable Brush-On Mineral Powder creates a radiant glow while benefiting the internal health of your skin, because beauty isn't just skin-deep. Our formula is crafted with custom-refined minerals and calcified red algae to nourish your skin. Prevent 90% of aging with chemical-free broad-spectrum UVA/UVB sunscreen. A delicate, radiant finish conceals any hyperpigmentation, rosacea, redness, or acne. Our lightweight powder is easily blended into your skin with the soft-bristle applicator brush. Ideal for travel, toss into your purse for your next weekend getaway. Its Vegan Active Ingredients: Titanium Dioxide 22.5%; Zinc Oxide 22.5% Inactive Ingredients: Mica, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethiconol/Propylsilsequioxane/Silicate Crosspolymer, Lycopodium Clavatum Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Imperata Cyclindrica Root Extract, Glycerin, Water, Caesalpinia Spinosa Fruit Pod Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Quercus Robur (Oak) Wood Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Sprout Extract, Maltodextrin, Methicone, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Laureth-4, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Iron Oxides (CI77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
